roleset.name: to unite in a federation,
roleset.note: FEDERATE-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from federate.01-v)

role.descr: causer of federation,and/or first entity uniting
other entities united with, if separate mention

example.name: federate-v: With resulting federation
example.text: The republics federated into the Soviet Union.

example.name: federate-v: More arguments
example.text: Queen Mary federated the Republic of John and the Republic of Jack into the Union of Maryland.

example.name: federation-n
example.text: Amhara culture, language and religion were imposed on the conquered peoples as well as Eritrea after its federation in 1952.
